name: Bitsadmin Download
description: Detects usage of bitsadmin downloading a file
false_positives: Some legitimate apps use this, but limited.
query: ((process.executable:/.*\\[Bb][Ii][Tt][Ss][Aa][Dd][Mm][Ii][Nn]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND process.command_line:(/.*\ \/[Cc][Rr][Ee][Aa][Tt][Ee]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \/[Aa][Dd][Dd][Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee]\ .*/) AND process.command_line:/.*[Hh][Tt][Tt][Pp].*/) OR (process.executable:/.*\\[Bb][Ii][Tt][Ss][Aa][Dd][Mm][Ii][Nn]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND process.command_line:/.*\ \/[Tt][Rr][Aa][Nn][Ss][Ff][Ee][Rr]\ .*/) OR process.command_line:/.*[Cc][Oo][Pp][Yy]\ [Bb][Ii][Tt][Ss][Aa][Dd][Mm][Ii][Nn]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee].*/)
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((process.executable:*\\bitsadmin.exe AND process.command_line:(*\ \/create\ * OR *\ \/addfile\ *) AND process.command_line:*http*) OR (process.executable:*\\bitsadmin.exe AND process.command_line:*\ \/transfer\ *) OR process.command_line:*copy\ bitsadmin.exe*)`
